data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 187 believers in Osmaniye against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Osmaniye, Turkey
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Osmaniye hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.section_summary: On average, 30 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Osmaniye, Turkey.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 187 believers in Osmaniye, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Osmaniye, Turkey that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Herki people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Osmaniye to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Osmaniye.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 187 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

location.name: Osmaniye
